name: globalize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to (make a company or system) spread or operate internationally: Satellite broadcasting is helping to globalize television. As the economy develops, it will continue to globalize.

to begin operating internationally: Satellite broadcasting is helping to globalize television. As the economy develops, it will continue to globalize.
